shell_variants.name: model_magic
shell_variants.note: S_shell uses model magic list (legacy in 7.13.15.*).

shell_variants.name: obs_magic
shell_variants.note: S_shell uses observed magic list (domain-independent mapping).

coulomb_finite_size.profile: 2pF (fixed a; c from r_rms via bisection)

deformation_beta2.imputation: direct for even-even when present; otherwise average of available even-even neighbors (Z±1,N±1), else 0
deformation_beta2.note: B(E2)-derived β2 is treated as a magnitude; the Coulomb shape factor uses |β2|.

spectroscopy_nudat3_multi.note: Uses NuDat 3.0 static chart JSON (ENSDF-derived) for E(2+_1), E(4+_1), E(3-_1) and R4/2; strict cross-check uses local extrema along isotopic/isotonic chains.

S_shell.form: x in (Mk,Mk1], p=x-Mk, g=Mk1-Mk; S_shell=p(p-g)/g^power (0 at magic boundaries)

shell_model.note: All coefficients are frozen using train magic only; other_magic is used for rejection (strict).

shell_variant.name: obs_magic
shell_variant.note: S_shell uses observed magic list (domain-independent mapping).

diag.conclusion: strict_pass=0/10 over shell variants x A_min cuts. This step adds an independently constrained deformation input beta2 (NNDC B(E2) adopted entries) and applies Coulomb shape factor f(beta2), surface-area factor g(beta2) on the surface term, robust: require agreement with direct-only (no-imputation) run on top of the frozen radius model + finite-size Coulomb baseline, while keeping the shell refreeze coefficients isospin-dependent kN(I)=kN0+kN1*I and kZ(I)=kZ0+kZ1*I (frozen on train magic N/Z in {50,82} only). If strict_pass==0, additional independently frozen structure inputs (beyond beta2) are still required. This step also integrates a spectroscopy-based strict cross-check using multiple NuDat 3.0 metrics (E2+, E4+, E3-, R4/2) via local extrema. This step also compares charge-radii kink as an observable (Δ²r_pred vs Δ²r_obs; step=2) and applies a fixed residual threshold |Δ²r_pred-Δ²r_obs|/σ_obs <= 3.

rule_extrema.gap_Sn: E2+(Z,N0) > E2+(Z,N0±2) when neighbors exist (even-even only)
rule_extrema.gap_Sp: E2+(Z0,N) > E2+(Z0±2,N) when neighbors exist (even-even only)

rule_extrema.gap_Sn: E4+(Z,N0) > E4+(Z,N0±2) when neighbors exist (even-even only)
rule_extrema.gap_Sp: E4+(Z0,N) > E4+(Z0±2,N) when neighbors exist (even-even only)

rule_extrema.gap_Sn: E3-(Z,N0) > E3-(Z,N0±2) when neighbors exist (even-even only)
rule_extrema.gap_Sp: E3-(Z0,N) > E3-(Z0±2,N) when neighbors exist (even-even only)

rule_extrema.gap_Sn: R4/2(Z,N0) < R4/2(Z,N0±2) when neighbors exist (even-even only)
rule_extrema.gap_Sp: R4/2(Z0,N) < R4/2(Z0±2,N) when neighbors exist (even-even only)

radius_shell.S_shell: p(p-g)/g^2 within magic shell (0..g); S=0 at shell edges
radius_shell.beta2_source: NNDC B(E2) adopted entries (deformationParameter β2; extracted_beta2.json)

radius_beta2.beta2_source: NNDC B(E2) adopted entries (deformationParameter β2; extracted_beta2.json)
